price: ߕߊ ߘߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߢߘߊ ߟߎ߬ ߡߊߖߋ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߊߞߘߐߛߌ߲߬ߛߌ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ߕߏ߫ ߥߊߦߌ߲߫
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
